title: i cant log onto my acoount
body: I created this account to send out a message to riot regarding my account. I am having issues logging into my account as if someone hacked it

replies.body:
If you're not able to access your account, you'll most definitely want to reach out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) right away!

Let me know if you have any questions.
